title: Encyclopedia of a Broken Heart: Poems
description: A collection of new poems on the themes of hurt, melancholy, and healing by Jon Lupin, the Poetry BanditFrom the poet behind You Only Love Me When I'm Suffering comes a new collection of poetry that will shake you to the core. Organized in the format of an encyclopedia, each letter of the alphabet includes several poems on the theme of the word that begins with that letter. Emotional and inspiring, Encyclopedia of a Broken Heart will appeal to every modern poetry lover.
author: Jon Lupin
